descriptions.description: Converts between text files with DOS, UNIX or MAC line breaks
dos2unix includes utilities to convert text files with DOS or MAC line breaks to Unix line breaks and vice versa. It also includes conversion of UTF-16 to UTF-8.

download.info: The main package contains the man pages only. This archive additionally contains htm, pdf, ps, and txt documents in nl, en, and es language.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=dos2unix PACKAGE_VERSION=6.0.4
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz
oeg_include_files *.txt
oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext
make CC=gcc PREFIX="${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" ENABLE_NLS=1 LIBS_EXTRA="-L${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} -lintl -liconv" -f mingw.mak make -f mingw.mak strip make -f mingw.mak install prefix="${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oeg_fix_path_names oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
